issue.title: [C++][CI] Fix Valgrind failures
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11970](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11970). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See errors in https://github.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/runs/2110197336 .
There are two sources of errors:
- GTest trying to print uninitialized memory when converting the CSV writer test params to a string
- The fast_float library sometimes reads uninitialized memory
